pageHeader.title: AWS PreChat
pageHeader.description: AWS PreChat is a conversational AI web system designed to streamline the pre-meeting preparation process between AWS sales teams and customers. The system replaces traditional Excel-based forms with an intuitive chatbot interface that guides customers through a structured conversation to collect business requirements, technical constraints, and project timelines. The collected information is then processed and presented to AWS sales representatives and engineers in an organized, actionable format.

header.title: âœ¨ Welcome to PreChat!
header.subtitle: Share your discussion topics and expectations with our AI agent before your AWS meeting.
header.streamlineSubtitle: Streamline your pre-meeting preparation with our intelligent chatbot assistant.

privacyTermsModal.title: Privacy Policy and Terms of Service
privacyTermsModal.description: Privacy policy and terms of service related to the use of AWS PreChat service.
privacyTermsModal.privacyPolicyContent:
# Privacy Policy

**Last Updated: August 2025**

## 1. Purpose of Personal Information Collection and Use

The PreChat service collects and uses personal information for the following purposes:

### Collection Purpose

- Collecting preliminary information for consultation services
- Analyzing customer requirements and proposing customized solutions
- Efficient meeting preparation with sales representatives
- Service quality improvement and statistical analysis

### Legal Basis

- Personal Information Protection Act Article 15 (Consent of data subject)
- Act on Promotion of Information and Communications Network Utilization and Information Protection Article 22

## 2. Personal Information Items Collected

### Required Information

- **Customer Information**: Name, email address, company name, position
- **Conversation Content**: Consultation conversation records with AI agent
- **Technical Information**: IP address, access time, browser information

### Automatically Collected Information

- Service usage records
- Access logs and cookie information

## 3. Personal Information Processing and Retention Period

### Retention Period

- **Consultation Session Data**: 30 days (automatic deletion)
- **Conversation Records**: 30 days after consultation completion
- **Statistical Analysis Data**: 1 year after removing personally identifiable information

### Deletion Method

- Automatic deletion upon expiration of retention period
- Immediate deletion upon data subject request

## 4. Third-Party Provision of Personal Information

### Provision Scope

- **Sales Representatives**: Limited provision for consultation purposes
- **Amazon Bedrock**: Processing conversation content for AI response generation

### Provision Conditions

- Prior consent from data subject
- Provision of minimal information only
- Request for immediate deletion after purpose achievement

## 5. Personal Information Processing Consignment

### Consignee

- **Amazon Web Services**: Cloud infrastructure and AI services
- **Consigned Tasks**: Data storage, AI model processing, system operation

### Consignment Management

- Conclusion and management of consignment contracts
- Imposition of Personal Information Protection Act compliance obligations

## 6. Rights of Data Subjects

### Exercisable Rights

- **Right to Access**: Confirmation of personal information processing status
- **Right to Correction/Deletion**: Request correction/deletion of incorrect information
- **Right to Processing Suspension**: Request suspension of personal information processing
- **Right to Claim Damages**: Claim compensation when damage occurs

### Method of Exercising Rights

- Email: aws-prechat@amazon.com

## 7. Personal Information Protection Measures

### Technical Measures

- Encrypted storage of personal information
- Access control management system
- Intrusion detection and blocking system

### Administrative Measures

- Designation of personal information protection officer
- Regular security training
- Personal information processing status inspection

## 8. Personal Information Protection Officer

### Personal Information Protection Manager

- **Name**: Jaebin Joo
- **Department**: Amazon Web Services / Cloud Sales Center
- **Contact**: jaebin@amazon.com

## 9. Notification Obligation

This privacy policy applies from the effective date, and when there are additions, deletions, and corrections of changes according to laws and policies, we will notify through announcements 7 days before the implementation of changes.

**Effective Date**: August 13, 2025
privacyTermsModal.termsOfServiceContent:
# Terms of Service

**Last Updated: August 2025**

## 1. General Provisions

### Purpose

These terms aim to stipulate the rights, obligations, and responsibilities between the company and users regarding the use of the PreChat service (hereinafter "Service").

### Definitions

- **"Company"**: Amazon Web Services, Inc. providing the PreChat service
- **"User"**: Individual or corporation using the service according to these terms
- **"Service"**: AI chat platform for cloud pre-consultation

## 2. Service Provision and Use

### Service Content

- Cloud pre-consultation through AI agent
- Meeting preparation support with sales representatives
- Customer requirement collection, analysis, and solution proposals

### Usage Conditions

- Individual or corporation aged 14 or older
- Valid email address possession
- Consent to these terms and privacy policy

### Service Provision Hours

- 24/7 year-round provision
- Temporary suspension possible after prior notice during system maintenance

## 3. User Obligations

### Prohibited Acts

- Identity theft or false information input
- Acts that interfere with stable service operation
- Transmission of content violating laws
- Commercial advertising or spam transmission
- System hacking or malicious code distribution

### Information Provision Obligation

- Provision of accurate and up-to-date information
- Immediate correction when personal information changes
- Consultation content appropriate for service use purpose

## 4. Company Obligations

### Service Provision Obligation

- Stable and continuous service provision
- Compliance with related laws including Personal Information Protection Act
- Prompt response to user inquiries

### Disclaimer

- Force majeure events such as natural disasters, wars, strikes
- Service usage disruption due to user's fault
- Disruption of services provided by third parties

## 5. Personal Information Protection

### Collection and Use

- Collection of minimal information necessary for service provision
- Immediate deletion after achieving collection purpose
- Prohibition of third-party provision without user consent

### Security Measures

- Personal information encryption and access control management
- Regular security inspections and vulnerability improvements
- Immediate notification in case of personal information breach

## 6. Intellectual Property Rights

### Copyright

- Copyright of all content within the service belongs to the company
- Users can use only for service usage purposes
- Prohibition of unauthorized reproduction, distribution, transmission

### User-Generated Content

- Rights to conversation content belong to users
- Company may utilize anonymized content for service improvement purposes

## 7. Service Usage Restrictions

### Restriction Reasons

- Violation of these terms
- Violation of laws or public order
- Causing serious disruption to service operation

### Restriction Procedure

- Prior warning and correction request
- Notification of restriction reason and period
- Opportunity for objection

## 8. Damages and Disclaimer

### Damage Compensation

- Compensation for damages due to company's intent or gross negligence
- Compensation scope limited to ordinary damages
- Exclusion of indirect, special, consequential damages

### Disclaimer Conditions

- Damages due to user's intent or negligence
- Damages due to third-party illegal acts
- Results of utilizing information obtained through service use

## 9. Dispute Resolution

### Governing Law

- Korean law as governing law
- Application of related laws including Personal Information Protection Act and Information and Communications Network Act

### Jurisdiction

- Exclusive jurisdiction of courts in company's location
- Priority on dispute resolution through mediation and arbitration

## 10. Miscellaneous

### Terms Amendment

- 7-day advance notice for terms changes
- 30-day advance notice for important changes
- Service use may be discontinued if disagreeing with amended terms

### Contact Information

- **Email**: aws-prechat@amazon.com
- **Address**: 12F East Building, Centerfield, 231 Teheran-ro, Gangnam-gu, Seoul

**Effective Date**: August 13, 2025

purposeSelector.headerDescription: Please select your consultation purpose before starting the consultation. You can select multiple purposes.

purposeSelector.purposeCostOptimizationDesc: Would you like to optimize AWS usage costs and increase efficiency?
purposeSelector.purposePartnerInquiryDesc: Are you inquiring about AWS partner programs or collaboration with partners?

chat.title: Share your concerns with PreChat.
chat.greetingMessage:
Hello, I am AWS PreChat. I would like to talk with you to help you successfully use the cloud.

  Please let me know what you would like to discuss and what you expect before meeting with us! I will deliver it to the appropriate AWS representative.
  
  If you provide attachments that will help with the meeting, such as architecture diagrams, I will review them together.
chat.inputPlaceholder: ðŸ’¬ Tell me about your business goals, technical challenges, or AWS requirements... I'm here to help!
chat.inputHintMobile: ðŸ’¡ Multi-line input is available. Press the Send button below to send.
chat.inputHintDesktop: ðŸ’¡ Press Enter for line break, use Send button to send message
chat.greetingTemplate: Hello, I am {{customerName}}, working as {{customerTitle}} at {{companyName}}. I joined this chat to share my concerns and expectations before our AWS meeting!
